{"id":412063338,"type":"t","title":"Marble Machine Live At Götaplatsen 2016","bandcamp_url":"https://wintergatan.bandcamp.com/track/marble-machine-live-at-g-taplatsen-2016","art_id":405535511,"band":{"band_id":2464198920,"name":"Wintergatan","image_id":1354613,"bio":"","location":"Gothenburg, Sweden"},"tralbum_artist":"Wintergatan","package_art":[],"featured_track_id":412063338,"tracks":[{"track_id":412063338,"track_license_id":null,"title":"Marble Machine Live At Götaplatsen 2016","track_num":null,"streaming_url":{"mp3-128":"https://bandcamp.com/stream_redirect?enc=mp3-128&track_id=412063338&ts=1752129565&t=77eb588fa567771cb69b3d138df75eac2df46a08"},"duration":263.5,"encodings_id":1207338551,"album_title":null,"band_name":"Wintergatan","art_id":null,"album_id":null,"is_streamable":true,"has_lyrics":false,"is_set_price":false,"price":0.0,"has_digital_download":true,"merch_ids":null,"merch_sold_out":null,"currency":"SEK","require_email":false,"is_purchasable":true,"band_id":2464198920,"label":null,"label_id":null}],"credits":"David Zandén: Bass, Typewriter & Glockenspiel
Evelina Hägglund: Mallet Kat
Martin Molin: Mallet Kat
Marcus Sjöberg: Drums

See the live video on Youtube:

https://youtu.be/F22DCvJ24Eg

Recorded by Martin Barni Johansson moretec.se
Mixed by Marcus Sjöberg & Martin Molin / Wintergatan
Cover Photo Graded by Samuel Westergren wepix.se
Filmed and edited by Hannes Knutsson lefvandebilder.se

Q: Why isn´t the Marble Machine on the stage?
A: Apart from not really being  transportable, the Marble Machine does not work well enough to be used on stage for the moment, too many design mistakes combined prohibits that. BUT! We are going to build a full sized Marble Machine 2.0 that we can tour with in the future. First we are going to record our new album and release that, after the release we will build the new modular Marble Machine 2.0 and the we will tour the world with the new record and the new Machine!

All the best!
